availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Willard (Louisville, Kentucky, hotel proprietor)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, hotel proprietor. Vermont native. Married to Mary J. Willard. Father of Mary R. Willard and Garrie Willard. Proprietor of the Willard Hotel in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 152A.
“Willard’s Hotel,” The Courier-Journal(Louisville, KY), May 13, 1865, p. 2
